price: Siku hiyo watu watatoka kwa mfarakano wakaonyweshwe vitendo vyao!
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
footnotes: Siku hiyo watu watatoka makaburini mbio, nao wamo katika mtafaruku, wapate kuziona hisabu zao na malipo yao aliyo waahidi Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yaṣduru al-nāsu ashtātan liyuraw aʿmālahum
